author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 21-year-old woman belonging to the Vanniyar community submitted a petition to the Superintendent of Police, Vellore seeking protection for her husband and in-laws following threat from her family members.

K. Santhiya, a resident of Nangamangalam village, Arakkonam and C. Sivaraman of Melapulam, Arakkonam got married on February 15. Sivaraman belonged to the SC community.

The couple got their marriage registered three days later.

In her petition, she said her family objected to their love, and hence, she had left her house to get married. She said her parents had filed a complaint with the Kaveripakkam police that she was missing, and the police were threatening to book her husband on charges of kidnap. Her in-laws were also threatened, she said in the petition.

She alleged that her family members and relatives wanted to murder them as she had married outside her caste.
title: Following threat from family, woman seeks protection for husband, in-laws
